title: GCE A/Ls: Special Examination Centres for COVID patients
content: The Department of Examinations has implemented a special programme to facilitate the candidates who have contracted the COVID-19 virus and those who are in quarantine, ahead of the 2021 GCE Advanced Level Examination scheduled to commence on Monday (Feb. 7).Accordingly, special Examination Centers have been set up for GCE A/L candidates infected with COVID-19.It is mandatory for candidates who are under quarantine, to report to the designated Examination Center as mentioned in their Admission Form and inform the Head of the Examination Centre that they are in quarantine, the Examinations Department emphasized.The same examination rules and regulations will be implemented at all Special Examination Centers dedicated to COVID-19 cases, L. M. D. Dharmasena, the Commissioner-General of Examinations noted.
